content.raw:
With a source build of bullet 2.82 (r2672), the [test/integration/transceiver.cc](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/56464db1d9b8b689ead4e31a299ba3a168481209/test/integration/transceiver.cc?at=default) test aborts with the following backtrace:
~~~
INTEGRATION_transceiver: /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/bullet/src/LinearMath/btVector3.h:293: btVector3& btVector3::normalize(): Assertion `length() != btScalar(0)' failed.

Program received signal SIGABRT, Aborted.
0x00007ffff4721425 in __GI_raise (sig=<optimized out>) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:64
64	../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff4721425 in __GI_raise (sig=<optimized out>) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:64
#1  0x00007ffff4724b8b in __GI_abort () at abort.c:91
#2  0x00007ffff471a0ee in __assert_fail_base (fmt=<optimized out>, assertion=0x7fffea5db426 "length() != btScalar(0)", 
    file=0x7fffea5db3e0 "/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/bullet/src/LinearMath/btVector3.h", line=<optimized out>, 
    function=<optimized out>) at assert.c:94
#3  0x00007ffff471a192 in __GI___assert_fail (assertion=0x7fffea5db426 "length() != btScalar(0)", 
    file=0x7fffea5db3e0 "/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/bullet/src/LinearMath/btVector3.h", line=293, 
    function=0x7fffea5db7c0 <btVector3::normalize()::__PRETTY_FUNCTION__> "btVector3& btVector3::normalize()")
    at assert.c:103
#4  0x00007fffea598ad3 in btVector3::normalize (this=0x7fffffffcf40)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/bullet/src/LinearMath/btVector3.h:293
#5  0x00007fffea2b1780 in btSingleRayCallback::btSingleRayCallback (this=0x7fffffffd030, rayFromWorld=..., 
    rayToWorld=..., world=0x7fffd32e91c0, resultCallback=...)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/bullet/src/BulletCollision/CollisionDispatch/btCollisionWorld.cpp:876
#6  0x00007fffea2aa7ae in btCollisionWorld::rayTest (this=0x7fffd32e91c0, rayFromWorld=..., rayToWorld=..., 
    resultCallback=...)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/bullet/src/BulletCollision/CollisionDispatch/btCollisionWorld.cpp:934
#7  0x00007ffff193f747 in gazebo::physics::BulletRayShape::GetIntersection (this=0x7fff5b7172d0, 
    _dist=@0x7fffffffd3a8: 0, _entity=...)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/gazebo/physics/bullet/BulletRayShape.cc:117
#8  0x00007ffff72d159c in gazebo::sensors::WirelessTransmitter::GetSignalStrength (this=this@entry=0x7fff6024efd0, 
    _receiver=..., rxGain=2.6000000000000001)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/WirelessTransmitter.cc:161
#9  0x00007ffff72d1a1c in gazebo::sensors::WirelessTransmitter::UpdateImpl (this=0x7fff6024efd0)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/WirelessTransmitter.cc:117
#10 0x00007ffff72bf361 in gazebo::sensors::Sensor::Update (this=0x7fff6024efd0, _force=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/Sensor.cc:200
#11 0x0000000000457667 in TransceiverTest::TxRxEmptySpace (this=this@entry=0x72d5d0, _physicsEngine=...)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/integration/transceiver.cc:139
#12 0x0000000000458581 in TransceiverTest_EmptyWorld_Test::TestBody (this=0x72d5d0)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/integration/transceiver.cc:389
#13 0x00000000004a35ea in HandleSehExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::Test, void> (method=<optimized out>, 
    object=<optimized out>, location=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2090
#14 testing::internal::HandleExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::Test, void> (object=object@entry=0x72d5d0, 
    method=&virtual testing::Test::TestBody(), location=location@entry=0x4acb72 "the test body")
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2126
#15 0x0000000000498c59 in testing::Test::Run (this=this@entry=0x72d5d0)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2162
#16 0x0000000000498d37 in testing::TestInfo::Run (this=0x72dea0)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2338
#17 0x0000000000498e75 in testing::TestCase::Run (this=0x72d210)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2445
#18 0x00000000004991dd in RunAllTests (this=0x72ad80)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:4237
#19 testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::RunAllTests (this=0x72ad80)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:4145
#20 0x00000000004a316a in HandleSehExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::internal::UnitTestImpl, bool> (
    method=<optimized out>, object=<optimized out>, location=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2090
#21 testing::internal::HandleExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::internal::UnitTestImpl, bool> (object=0x72ad80, 
    method=
    (bool (testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::*)(testing::internal::UnitTestImpl * const)) 0x498ef0 <testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::RunAllTests()>, location=location@entry=0x4adc90 "auxiliary test code (environments or event listeners)")
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2126
#22 0x00000000004984b1 in testing::UnitTest::Run (this=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:3874
#23 0x000000000045224f in main (argc=1, argv=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/integration/transceiver.cc:418
~~~
It may be related to the use of a single `BulletRayShape`. See also issue #539.
content.html:
With a source build of bullet 2.82 (r2672), the test/integration/transceiver.cc test aborts with the following backtrace:

INTEGRATION_transceiver: /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/bullet/src/LinearMath/btVector3.h:293: btVector3& btVector3::normalize(): Assertion `length() != btScalar(0)' failed.

Program received signal SIGABRT, Aborted.
0x00007ffff4721425 in __GI_raise (sig=<optimized out>) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:64
64  ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff4721425 in __GI_raise (sig=<optimized out>) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:64

#2  0x00007ffff471a0ee in __assert_fail_base (fmt=<optimized out>, assertion=0x7fffea5db426 "length() != btScalar(0)", 
    file=0x7fffea5db3e0 "/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/bullet/src/LinearMath/btVector3.h", line=<optimized out>, 
    function=<optimized out>) at assert.c:94
#3  0x00007ffff471a192 in __GI___assert_fail (assertion=0x7fffea5db426 "length() != btScalar(0)", 
    file=0x7fffea5db3e0 "/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/bullet/src/LinearMath/btVector3.h", line=293, 
    function=0x7fffea5db7c0 <btVector3::normalize()::__PRETTY_FUNCTION__> "btVector3& btVector3::normalize()")
    at assert.c:103
#4  0x00007fffea598ad3 in btVector3::normalize (this=0x7fffffffcf40)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/bullet/src/LinearMath/btVector3.h:293

    rayToWorld=..., world=0x7fffd32e91c0, resultCallback=...)

    method=<optimized out>, object=<optimized out>, location=<optimized out>)

#21 testing::internal::HandleExceptionsInMethodIfSupported<testing::internal::UnitTestImpl, bool> (object=0x72ad80, 
    method=
    (bool (testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::*)(testing::internal::UnitTestImpl * const)) 0x498ef0 <testing::internal::UnitTestImpl::RunAllTests()>, location=location@entry=0x4adc90 "auxiliary test code (environments or event listeners)")
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:2126
#22 0x00000000004984b1 in testing::UnitTest::Run (this=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest.cc:3874
#23 0x000000000045224f in main (argc=1, argv=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo_bullet/src/gazebo/test/integration/transceiver.cc:418

It may be related to the use of a single BulletRayShape. See also issue #539.
